definition: to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: In this paper, thermodynamics of irreversible processes at negative absolute temperatures is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論負絕對溫度下的不可逆過程熱力學。

sentences.english: Absolute temperatures weren't published in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 草案中並沒有公佈絕對溫度。

sentences.english: Both this theorem and the unattainability of absolute zero can't be derived from each other.
sentences.chinese: 但能氏定理與比熱隨正絕對溫度趨於零則可互推。

sentences.english: Absolute zero is the lowest possible temperature.
sentences.chinese: 絕對溫度是物體的最低可能溫度。

sentences.english: From the increase in the weight of the desiccant the absolute humidity can be determined.
sentences.chinese: 可從乾燥劑重量的增加來確定絕對溫度。
